# saviynt_file_transfer_job_resource (Resource)

Create and manage File Transfer Job triggers in Saviynt

## Example Usage

```terraform
// Copyright (c) 2025 Saviynt Inc.
// SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

resource "saviynt_file_transfer_job_resource" "example" {
  jobs = [
    {
      name                    = "file_transfer_trigger_1" # required
      job_group               = "ECFConnector"            # required
      group                   = "GRAILS_JOBS"             # required
      cron_exp                = "0 0 2 * * ?"             # required
      external_connection_key = "7442"                    # required
      file_transfer_action    = "UPLOAD"                  # required
    },
    {
      name                    = "file_transfer_trigger_2" # required
      job_group               = "ECFConnector"            # required
      group                   = "GRAILS_JOBS"             # required
      cron_exp                = "0 0 3 * * ?"             # required
      external_connection_key = "5781"                    # required
      file_transfer_action    = "DOWNLOAD"                # required
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `jobs` (Attributes List) List of File Transfer Job configurations (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--jobs))

<a id="nestedatt--jobs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `jobs`

Required:

- `cron_exp` (String) Cron expression defining the schedule for the trigger. Example: "0 0 2 * * ?"
- `external_connection_key` (String) External connection key for file transfer
- `file_transfer_action` (String) File transfer action (UPLOAD or DOWNLOAD)
- `group` (String) Group classification for the trigger. Example: "GRAILS_JOBS"
- `job_group` (String) Name of the job group associated with the trigger. Example: "utility"
- `name` (String) Unique name of the trigger. Example: "MyTrigger_001"
